reviews.subject: Introduction to Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Smith is engaging and makes the material easy to understand. However, his exams can be a bit tricky.

reviews.subject: Calculus I
reviews.review: Dr. Davis is fantastic! She explains complex concepts clearly and is very approachable.

reviews.subject: Modern American History
reviews.review: The subject matter is interesting, but Professor Johnson's lectures can be a bit dry and monotonous.

reviews.subject: Organic Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Lee is knowledgeable but her teaching style is very fast-paced. I struggled to keep up with the course.

reviews.subject: Introduction to Sociology
reviews.review: Professor Brown is very insightful and encourages class participation. The assignments are fair.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Dr. White is excellent. She uses real-world examples to make statistics less intimidating.

reviews.subject: Ethics in Philosophy
reviews.review: Professor Green's class is thought-provoking, but his grading can be inconsistent and subjective.

reviews.subject: Biology 101
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez is passionate about biology and makes the lectures interactive and engaging.

reviews.subject: World Literature
reviews.review: Professor Wilson is an amazing teacher. His love for literature is contagious and his analyses are deep and insightful.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson covers a lot of material, which can be overwhelming. Her feedback on assignments is helpful though.

reviews.subject: Computer Science Fundamentals
reviews.review: Professor Anderson is fantastic at breaking down complex concepts and his coding labs are very practical.

reviews.subject: Microeconomics
reviews.review: Dr. Robinson is clear and concise in her explanations. The course is well-organized and the assignments are relevant.

reviews.subject: Creative Writing
reviews.review: Professor Carter provides minimal feedback on writing assignments and the class lacks structure.

reviews.subject: Genetics
reviews.review: Dr. Young is incredibly knowledgeable and her enthusiasm for genetics makes the subject matter exciting.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Professor Lewis is engaging and knowledgeable, but his lectures sometimes go off-topic.

reviews.subject: Calculus II
reviews.review: Dr. Hall is a good teacher, but the course material is challenging and her exams are difficult.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Professor Nelson brings art to life with his vivid descriptions and passion. The assignments are creative and enjoyable.

reviews.subject: Physics I
reviews.review: Dr. Adams is knowledgeable, but her explanations can be hard to follow at times. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: Business Management
reviews.review: Professor Clark is incredibly practical and gives real-world examples that are applicable to the industry.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Lewis is passionate about linguistics and makes the subject accessible and interesting.
